houses.property_details: EXCLUSIVE NEWLY LISTEDRenovated 6-Bd. Brick House w/ Patio, Yard & Garden on Netherland Ave.This 6-bedroom, 2-full- and 2-half bath, renovated brick house is located at 3031 Netherland Avenue (just south of West 231st Street) and was built in 1958.Features include: a tiled entry foyer; living room with eastern windows; formal dining room; renovated kitchen with granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances; main-floor bedroom and windowed full bathroom; rear 2nd-floor balcony; finished basement with recreation room, wet bar and half bathroom; storage attic with pull-down stairs; back mudroom with laundry; central air-conditioning; rear patio and garden; attached 2-car garage + gated 2-car driveway; 37-by-129-ft. lot.Conveniently situated for shops, parks, Metro-North trains, and express buses to Manhattan's East and West Sides.

houses.property_details: Immaculate Hi-Ranch, All Detached brick, Fully updated new kitchen & baths. Ceramic & granite floors, 4 bedrooms, 2 new full baths, New windows & doors, Full stand-up attic, Private yard, private driveway & 1 car garage.

houses.property_details: Spectacular opportunity to own this wonderful co-op in a very convenient part of Rego Park. Close to shops, transportation, schools and shopping. Will not last!!!
